data.author: Glenn Corwin

changelog.release_notes: Updated to the latest SDK for Pebble. Due to differences between the old and new SDKs some minor user interface changes were made. The list of organizations can be customized by updating the settings on the connected phone. Minor bug fixes and cosmetic changes.

* Under-the-hood changes to store timer information in resources. This makes the application much smaller, which in-turn allows for more organizations.
* Added NCAA Men.
* Adjusted the timer to take missed seconds into account (Pebble Time seems to miss ticks occasionally).
2.7 - Corrected newly added warmup to be 13:00 (5-4-4).
2.6 - Make + and - function correctly for NERVA Juniors when setting warmup time.
2.5 - Under NERVA Juniors, added 14:00 (6-4-4) warmup timer (good for AAU).
2.4 - Fixed incorrect text during NHIAA "between sets" timer.

Version 2.3: Fixed bug where pause/resume icon was incorrect. *** Version 2.2: Cleaned up the timer pause/resume feature and fixed the pause icon. For NCAA Women's volleyball, fixed the long-press of the down< button to vibrate when starting the Extended Intermission timer. It also doesn't wait for the button to be released. *** Version 2.1: Added pause/resume for the select button while the timer is running. For NCAA Women's volleyball, a long-press of the down button, for starting the "between sets" timer, will start a 10-minute Extended Intermission timer (with 3-minute horn warning) when an extended intermission is used between sets 2 and 3. Added NHIAA.

Version 2.2: Cleaned up the timer pause/resume feature and fixed the pause icon. For NCAA Women's volleyball, fixed the long-press of the down< button to vibrate when starting the Extended Intermission timer. It also doesn't wait for the button to be released. *** Version 2.1: Added pause/resume for the select button while the timer is running. For NCAA Women's volleyball, a long-press of the down button, for starting the "between sets" timer, will start a 10-minute Extended Intermission timer (with 3-minute horn warning) when an extended intermission is used between sets 2 and 3. Added NHIAA.

Version 2.1: Added pause/resume for the select button while the timer is running. For NCAA Women's volleyball, a long-press of the down button, for starting the "between sets" timer, will start a 10-minute Extended Intermission timer (with 3-minute horn warning) when an extended intermission is used between sets 2 and 3. Added NHIAA.
2.0.5: Changed default timeout time to 1:15 for MIAA and NCAA Women (per 2014-2015 rule change: NCAA 11.2.2). Bugfixes and code cleanup.

2.0.4: Combined NERVA Juniors into single entry and made warmup time selectable (7 or 10 minutes). Made the clock consistent with the scoresheet for the particular organization (12 or 24 hour format).
Version 2.0.3: Figured out the best way to maintain accuracy. Determine when timer starts relative to clock ticks and delay timer ticks from clock ticks.
Repeated 1-second timers was losing tiny amounts of time (which magnified the longer the timer ran). Changed to use the clock "seconds" timer to maintain accuracy.

data.description: Volleyball Referee Timer for Pebble Smartwatch aids volleyball referees in timing 3 things: warmups, timeouts, and the interval between sets. Since different rulesets use variations of these, it lets you choose the ruleset and lets you customize your timers for matches that you are refereeing. To ensure you never miss anything important, it will vibrate to alert you to upcoming actions.

latest_release.release_notes: Updated to the latest SDK for Pebble. Due to differences between the old and new SDKs some minor user interface changes were made. The list of organizations can be customized by updating the settings on the connected phone. Minor bug fixes and cosmetic changes.

data.title: Volleyball Referee Timer
